pre-trained 300 - D Glove 840B vectors.from sentence: We use pre-trained 300 - D Glove 840B vectors to initialize our word embedding vectors .

fairly small batch size.from sentence: We use a fairly small batch size of 32 to provide more exploration power to the model .

of.from sentence: All hidden states of BiLSTMs during input encoding and inference have 450 dimensions ( r = 300 and d = 450 ) .

weights.from sentence: The weights are learned by minimizing the log - loss on the training data via the Adam optimizer ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ) .

overfitting.from sentence: To avoid overfitting , we use dropout with the rate of 0.4 for regularization , which is applied to all feedforward connections .

word embeddings.from sentence: During training , the word embeddings are updated to learn effective representations for the NLI task .
